bibl.title: The Cheirographon and the Privatization of Scribal Activity in Early Roman Oxyrhynchos.

series.title: Akten der Gesellschaft für griechische und hellenistische Rechtsgeschichte.

bibl.note: The cheirographon is the documentation of a legal transaction in the format of a letter. Its author is the prospective debtor, its addressee the future creditor.

bibl.title: Symposion 2007. Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Durham, 2.-6. September 2007). Papers on Greek and Hellenistic Legal History (Durham, September 2-6 2007)

bibl.seg: YIFTACH-FIRANKO Uri, The Cheirographon and the Privatization of Scribal Activity in Early Roman Oxyrhynchos.

Edward M. HARRIS und Gerhard THÜR (Hgg.), Symposion 2007. Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Durham, 2.-6. September 2007). Papers on Greek and Hellenistic Legal History (Durham, September 2-6 2007) = Akten der Gesellschaft für griechische und hellenistische Rechtsgeschichte. 20 (Wien, 2008) pp. 325-340.
The cheirographon is the documentation of a legal transaction in the format of a letter. Its author is the prospective debtor, its addressee the future creditor.
